pr_title: fix: [DHIS2-10109] Filter out program rules for data elements that are not supposed to be applied

timeline.message: fix: [DHIS2-10109] Filter out program rules for data elements that are not supposed to be applied

timeline.bodyText: Mocking data is a bit controversial, in general, it should be avoided. I guess in this case, it's not worth to change.
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio

replies.bodyText:
When we test and there is the Preheat involved is always difficult to go to the actual service to mock it.
In the end, we are using the Preheat as a service that give us the data from the DB in a performant way.
replies.author: enricocolasante
luciano-fiandesio
